title: Brentwood, Essex
summary: Brentwood is a town in the Borough of Brentwood, in the county of Essex in the East of England.[1] It is in the London commuter belt, situated 20 miles (30Â km) east-north-east of Charing Cross and close by the M25 motorway. In 2017, the population of the town was estimated to be 54,885.[2]
